reg_info.full_title: R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 858: UNIVERSITY ACADEMICS AND TEACHING ASSISTANTS

content.content: 1. The Act applies to every person who is employed as a member or teaching assistant of the academic staff of a university or of a related institution.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 858, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The Act applies to every person who is employed as a member or teaching assistant of the academic staff of a university or of a related institution.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 858, s. 1.
